ai-tha-ap183:1.1_0: “A Buddha praised the appearance of a golden palanquin,
ai-tha-ap183:1.2_0: I woke up to my mother.
ai-tha-ap183:1.3_0: as they looked around in all directions.
ai-tha-ap183:2.2_0: And here it is the meaning:
ai-tha-ap183:2.3_0: Trembling, after must have been reborn.
ai-tha-ap183:3.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-tha-ap183:3.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap183:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap183:4.1_0: in this place wherever seven eons
ai-tha-ap183:4.2_0: with three garlands, all the flowers,
ai-tha-ap183:5.3_0: I’ve realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap183:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Jayas.
ai-tha-ap183:7.1_0: First the first Elder Nun Bhaddiya
